constituent: tailor, Thanksgiving, harvest festival, ten, needle, fiesta, top hat, scarf, cloth, clothes, clothing, garment
heisigStory: You might think here of garment that have been specially tailored for Thanksgiving celebrations to look like traditional Pilgrim garb.
koohiiStory1: The tailor was hard at work making sure all the pilgrims were dressed in their best garments for thanksgiving.
koohiiStory2: The tailor worked hard after thanksgiving to alter garments so they´d fit people who´d eaten too much at their thanksgiving dinners.
myStory: thợ may. mười người cầm giáo may quần áo.
readingExamples: 裁く (さば.く), 裁つ (た.つ)
words: decency, style, form, appearance, show, get-up, format
